description: The learner asks LinguaCoach for an intermediate Japanese vocabulary list about weather. The assistant fetches the list, then retrieves pronunciation audio for each word and presents the words with translations and audio links.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI-powered language learning coach. Help users learn new vocabulary, provide pronunciation audio, track progress, and generate exercises. Use the provided tools when needed.
Could you give me a Japanese vocabulary list on weather terms at the intermediate level, and also send me audio examples for each term?
Sure! Let me pull an intermediate‑level Japanese weather vocabulary list for you.
Great, I have the words. I’ll now get short pronunciation audio clips for each term.

Here’s your intermediate Japanese weather vocabulary list with pronunciation links:

1. **雨 (あめ) – rain** – ▶️ [Listen](https://audio.linguacoach.com/ja/雨.mp3)
2. **雪 (ゆき) – snow** – ▶️ [Listen](https://audio.linguacoach.com/ja/雪.mp3)
3. **風 (かぜ) – wind** – ▶️ [Listen](https://audio.linguacoach.com/ja/風.mp3)
4. **雷 (かみなり) – thunder** – ▶️ [Listen](https://audio.linguacoach.com/ja/雷.mp3)
5. **曇り (くもり) – cloudy** – ▶️ [Listen](https://audio.linguacoach.com/ja/曇り.mp3)

Feel free to practice saying each word while listening. Let me know if you’d like a short matching exercise to test yourself on these terms!
